wishes: May the years ahead be filled with love and joy.
name: John Mark

wishes: Here's to a lifetime full of happiness and love.
name: Mark Wong

wishes: Wishing you joy, love and happiness on your wedding day and as you begin your new life together.
name: Maen J.

wishes: I'm seeing a fun-filled life in your future. Congratulations!
name: Wong M

wishes: We’re so thrilled to celebrate this wonderful day with you both.
name: Jinny Fin

wishes: Rejoice in your love for each other! God bless you now and always.
name: Bean W.

wishes: Time flies and things change, but I wish that your love for each other would stay unchangeable.
name: Carrt Bazz

wishes: You’ve made me believe in true love. And I hope my belief will be unwavering forever, because it seems like you’ll stay together until the end.
name: Moo M.

wishes: As you step into a new life as new couples, you become treasure to our community and the world.
name: Fish J.

wishes: Let love be the focal point of your daily life. May you find hope, peace and faith in each other’s arms.
name: Jinny Fin
